name: Rune Fangame 2: A Fantasy Rune Factory
name_original: Rune Fangame 2: A Fantasy Rune Factory
description:
This is the second in a series of Rune Factory-based interactive short stories. Each story is for a different couple in the Rune Factory series.

I accept requests, but you should know that I've never had the first game and the only 2 I really finished were 3 and 4. So please don't be upset if I don't know the couple you request. Send me requests at any of the contacts I list at the beginning of the game, or just leave a comment here.

This game is focused on... Doug and Dylas!!!
